meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Room #1 C-South and Videoconference

attendees.chair: Jarred D. Davis, MS, Sr. CAAP

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approve minutes from the November 7, 2023, Regular Civil Service Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Hearing Item
agenda_items.description: Hear the rehire eligibility appeal hearing of Mr. Isaac Ruiz, a former employee in the Courts and Detention Service Department.

agenda_items.title: Briefing and Discussion Items
agenda_items.description: Various topics including Civil Services Rules Revision Forecast, Sworn Service Promotional Forecast and Vendor Selection Process, Civil Service Annual Report Development, Civil Service 2022-23 Priorities and Outcomes, and Department Updates and Announcements.
